section.name: Welcome
section.p: Welcome to PAL - the Publisher's Astrogrid Library. This is a standard AstroGrid datacenter interface to the publisher's data.
To query that data using this interface, go to the 'Ask Query' on the left.

section.name: Install Notes
section.p: If you have just installed PAL, then you can now run some self-tests to run diagnostics, or go the read how to configure your datacenter
